description:
Non material admendment to planning permission ref P090206 dated 01 April 2009 for the 'Redevelopment of Regent Quarter Block D, comprising of part demolition, part conversion of existing buildings  and erection of part 2 to 6 storey buildings to accommodate 5439m² business (Use Class B1), 175m² restaurant (Use Class A3) and 54 residential units (19x1, 30x2 and 5x3 beds), with 135 cycle spaces, 3 disabled spaces and associated landscaping'.  The amendments comprise of: 
A] Rebuilding part of the rear elevation where existing chimney breasts are to be removed;
B] Alterations to the proportions and design of the front entrance doors and fanlights.
The alterations relate specifically to the properties known as No's 39-51 Wharfdale Road.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All new external work to the re-built element of the rear elevation, as indicated on drawings 710/PRO/031 C5 and 710/PRO/037 C3 shall be carried out in reclaimed London yellow stock brick with architectural detailing to match the existing facing work of the building. 

REASON: To ensure that the Local Planning Authority may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building.
